member.summary: Tests whether two HsvColor structures are identical.

The second HsvColor structure to compare.

member.summary: Tests whether two HsvColor structures are not identical.
member.param: The first HsvColor structure to compare.
The second HsvColor structure to compare.
member.returns: true if c1 and c2 are not equal; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:TAlex.WPF.Controls.HsvColor.A
member.summary: Gets or sets the alpha channel of the color. Value ranges from 0 to 1.

member.name: P:TAlex.WPF.Controls.HsvColor.H
member.summary: Gets or sets the hue of the color. Value ranges from 0 to 360.

member.name: P:TAlex.WPF.Controls.HsvColor.S
member.summary: Gets or sets the saturation of the color. Value ranges from 0 to 1.

member.name: P:TAlex.WPF.Controls.HsvColor.V
member.summary: Gets or sets the value (brightness) of the color. Value ranges from 0 to 1.

member.name: P:TAlex.WPF.Controls.HsvColor.IntA
member.summary: Gets or sets integer value of the alpha channel of the color. Value ranges from 0 to 100.

member.name: P:TAlex.WPF.Controls.HsvColor.IntH
member.summary: Gets or sets integer value of the hue of the color. Value ranges from 0 to 360.

member.name: P:TAlex.WPF.Controls.HsvColor.IntS
member.summary: Gets or sets integer value of the saturation of the color. Value ranges from 0 to 100.

member.name: P:TAlex.WPF.Controls.HsvColor.IntV
member.summary: Gets or sets integer value of the value (brightness) of the color. Value ranges from 0 to 100.
